title: Require experienced developer to build Shopify Theme for theme store.
snippet:
Looking for an experienced theme developer to build a Shopify Theme for the Theme store. This theme should be designed to have a high PageSpeed score and will be optimized for conversions. For the right developer this will be an ongoing project. 

Examples of features this theme will have:
-Responsive theme for mobile and desktop
-Countdown timers & scarcity bar
-Exit intent pop up for e-mail collection
-Drawer type cart
-Product recommendations & upsell
-No carousel
-Product description beside product image with add to cart button at the top of the product description.
-Clean navigation
